name: Bill Gates Gems Collection
description:
After many years of digging through old files in Microsoft's archives, the lost pack-in title for Windows 99 was finally found!

Bill Gates Gems Collection is a compilation of 3 wonderful games!

These include:

  • Super House Wreck 6000
  • Flappy Gates
  • BillGates.EXE

CONTROLS

Super House Wreck 6000: Press Space, RALt, RControl, Left, and Down in that order to destroy a house

Flappy Gates: Left click to jump

BillGates.EXE Left and Right arrows to move

Enjoy!
